name: Low-Fat Taco Salad
author: Food Tourist
summary: Super-tasty taco salad without any guilt. The fat-free cottage cheese, flavored with restaurant-style taco sauce, serves as a fat-free creamy dressing. Delish!
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package vegetarian ground beef crumbles (such as MorningStar Farms® Griller's Recipe Crumbles®)
2 tablespoons taco sauce, or to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Saute garlic in hot oil until fragrant and slightly softened, about 2 minutes
Add diced tomatoes, vegetarian ground beef crumbles, and  ; cook and stir until tomatoes are soft, about 10 minutes
Divide lettuce between two bowls and top each with half the tomato mixture
Surround tomato mixture with cottage cheese and sprinkle Cheddar cheese over the top; season with taco sauce
